#include<iostream>
#define sll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int main(void){
    long long n,k;
    long long m;
    int t;
    si(t);
    while(t--){
        sll(n);sll(k);sll(m);
        if(k==1){
            printf("%lld\n",n);
            continue;
        }
        
        while(n%k==0&&m){
            m--;
            n/=k;
        }
         //printf("here= %lld\n",m&1);
        if(m&1){
            printf("%lld\n",n*k);
        }
        else{
            printf("%lld\n",n);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
